pages.text: The 'spotlight+' page type works similarly to the 'spotlight' page type, but uses the same formating as all my other pages. This allows you to have a more consistent look in your book. You also get the improved debug information like on all other pages.

One major difference to the default 'spotlight' page type is that you can display custom textures instead of items. This allows you to have a more flexible design for your book. Without the need of making a template for it. Like making a 'info' page.
